live action Red and blue movie
summary: Detective Pikachu can say “hell” and “damn” so he’s just checking if Red could be PG13 enough for the Red and Blue movie.  Based...
caption:
Detective Pikachu can say “hell” and “damn” so he’s just checking if Red could be PG13 enough for the Red and Blue movie. 

Based off an old comic somewhere on tumblr where Mario is taunted by Wario to curse.

reblog.comment:
Detective Pikachu can say “hell” and “damn” so he’s just checking if Red could be PG13 enough for the Red and Blue movie. 

Based off an old comic somewhere on tumblr where Mario is taunted by Wario to curse.

trail.content_raw:
Detective Pikachu can say “hell” and “damn” so he’s just checking if Red could be PG13 enough for the Red and Blue movie. 

Based off an old comic somewhere on tumblr where Mario is taunted by Wario to curse.
trail.content:
Detective Pikachu can say “hell” and “damn” so he’s just checking if Red could be PG13 enough for the Red and Blue movie. 

Based off an old comic somewhere on tumblr where Mario is taunted by Wario to curse.

summary:
So I looked on the poster and circled all the Pokemon on it (including Pikachu, just the include the lil guy)
So far I can...
body:
So I looked on the poster and circled all the Pokemon on it (including Pikachu, just the include the lil guy)

So far I can see:

Pikachu (duh)

Loudred (very bottom)

Treecko (on the sign that says ‘fool’)

Squirtle (on the building with Treecko, right near him)

Jigglypuff, Bulbasaur and Psyduck (all on the building that Pikachu and Tim are on, in the windows, Psyduck is only peeking out though) (he’s a… peeking duck)

Little group of Emolga (literally they’ve been in every trailer) (also on the Pikachu building, farther to the right almost off of the poster)

Something unknown, possibly Caterpie?? Genuinely not sure. (Also on Pikachu building, just on the side! If anyone knows what it is, tell me!)

Mr. Mime (in the background, his circle is right between the Emolga and the mystery green thing)

Aipom that DON’T look like nightmare creatures! Cuties! (On the actual Detective Pikachu sign, one on top one on the right side)

Charizard, possibly shiny? (Way in the back night sky, took me a while to realize he was there!)

Possible Mewtwo. (On one of the back buildings, hard to make out, could be something else but it could be him, would be a nice reference to OG Mewtwo on the top of a building)

summary: everyone surprised that detective pikachu can say hell in a pg movie is outing themselves as having not seen kubo and the two...
body:
everyone surprised that detective pikachu can say hell in a pg movie is outing themselves as having not seen kubo and the two strings.


This is an opportunity, my friends. Enlighten the masses.

blog.description: Kimmy ko. Certified Dumbass. I do art, but Mostly fanart. Fire emblem typically, but i also do, pokemon, Mystery Skulls, LOZ, etc. Typically Traditional art but is getting better at using my “tablet” (aka my ipad). I do commissions but if you want me to draw Chrom or Inigo i will ABSOLUTLY do that shit for free. Twitter is artsyRenegade @SloanKimmy.

summary: When we were kids, my sister would always tell me that if I were a Pokémon I'd be Mr.Mime. and like. I hate that. But...
body:
When we were kids, my sister would always tell me that if I were a Pokémon I’d be Mr.Mime. and like. I hate that. But also…

Like….

Was she Wrong?
